summary: Dairy management app with milk collection, sales, and cash payment tracking features
architectural_notes: App includes Cash Payment, Sell, and Milk Collection functionality
Cash Payment replaced previous Cash Received feature in Version 25

existing_features.title: Add edit functionality to Cash Payment and Cash Received transactions in the CashModule component, allowing users to modify the amount, date, and description of existing cash transactions
Add edit functionality to product sale entries in the SellModule component, allowing users to modify the product, quantity, price, customer name, and date of existing sales
Add edit functionality to milk collection entries, allowing users to modify the weight, fat percentage, SNF value, and date of existing collection records

new_feature_requests.summary: Add edit functionality for Cash, Sell, and Milk Collection entries
Show recently added entries (from one day) in Cash and Sell tabs
Create backend functions to support updating existing CollectionEntry, Transaction, and ProductSale records by their IDs
